create_account_form.title: Sign up for a test account

sec1.title:
We're here to help
you change with it.
sec1.copy: Business isn't easy, and to succeed, you need to focus on keeping ahead of customer demand. We effortlessly handle the ever-changing ways they want to pay so money keeps flowing through your business.
sec1.footer_copy: Because our job is keeping you in front of your customers.

card1.title: Onboard Instantly
card1.body: Business moves fast, and so do we. No wait, no arrogrance, no excuses.

card2.title: Integrate effortlessly
card2.body: Offer your customers’ chosen payment provider for a seamless shopping experience.

card3.title: Take Payments
card3.body: Globally, reliably, inexpensively. Let your money flow and your sales grow.

sec3.copy: We’ve created an innovative, flexible payment platform that keeps you ahead of the changing ways customers want to pay. Ceevo makes it easy to accept almost any type of payment – leaving you to focus on your business.

sec4.copy: We're a fintech company with our feet on the ground. Our features are sophisticated yet simply designed to help your business fly, keeping you right whee you should be - out in front.

card1.title: Open-source Plugins
card1.copy: Integrate in minutes with our plugins or payment pop-up.

card2.title: 3-D Secure
card2.copy: Increased card transaction security with 3-D Secure support.

card3.title: Dynamic Descripto
card3.copy: Choose how transactions appear on customer statements.

card4.title: Multi-currency
card4.copy: Bill your customers in their own currencies

card5.title: Card Tokenisation
card5.copy: Securely store customer card details for later use

card6.title: Recurring Payments
card6.copy: Keep customers coming back with recurring payments.

card7.title: Settlement Currencies
card7.copy: Receive funds in one of 14 settlement currencies.

card8.title: Weekly Payouts
card8.copy: Processed weekly to your settlement account.

card9.title: Multilingual Support
card9.copy: Payment page supports all 24 official EU languages

card10.title: Compliance
card10.copy: PCI, DSS and PSD2 taken care of for you.

card11.title: Fraud & Risk Management
card11.copy: Protecting your business from fraudulent transactions.

card12.title: Security
card12.copy: Advanced security to protect you and your customers.

sec5.copy: Keeping ahead doesn’t stop at payments. Ceevo is committed to making your whole business run smoother – which is why we integrate with today's and tomorrow's software.

card1.title: WooCommerce
card1.copy: Popular, customisable open source e-commerce platform for WordPress.

card2.title: Magento
card2.copy: Open source, e-commerce solution for developers and small businesses.

card3.title: Prestashop
card3.copy: Flexible, light, and fast open source e-commerce solution.

card4.title: Opencart
card4.copy: Open source, PHP-based online e-commerce solution

card5.title: Shopware
card5.copy: Flexible, customisable, and simple e-commerce solution made in Germany

card6.title: XT:Commerce
card6.copy: Professional e-commerce platform for B2B or B2C online businesses.

sec6.title: Dashboard
sec6.copy: Everything you need right in front of you, customisable, and displayed graphically so at a glance you can spot trends and opportunities.

sec7.title: Our Pricing
sec7.copy:
setup costs, no hidden fees. Ceevo charges a minimum fee of X, and the most
you’ll be charged for any transaction is just X

card1.heading: PAY AS YOU GO
card1.title: 1% per transaction
card1.copy:
in 20p, capped at £2

Start taking payments today.
We don't tie you into contracts and only charge for successful transactions.

card2.heading: ENTERPRISE
card2.title: Volume Based Pricing
card2.copy:
Run your business at scale with Ceevo.

We're here to partner with you,
wherever that takes us together,
we'll make the journey a little easier,
and maybe a bit more f
card2.limits: Run your business at scale with Ceevo.

block1.copy: Seen 'CEEVO LTD' on your bank statement?

card1.title: Credit & debit cards
card1.copy:
We charge a fixed fee and a percentage of the transaction each time you
accept a credit or debit card payment. The price is the same for all cards.
You don’t pay anything for failed charges.

tab1.title: Are there any setup and/or monthly fees?
tab1.content: No. We don’t have any additional monthly, set-up, integration, or account closure fees. We do however have a monthly minimum invoice of X per month, depending on transactional volume and region(s) of operation

tab2.title: Do you offer multi-currency support for transactions?
tab2.content: Yes. We can support payment in any currency supported by MasterCard/Visa, and settlement in one of 14 currencies.

tab3.title: Is it possible to link multiple bank accounts?
tab3.content: Yes. We are able to support the linking of multiple bank accounts.

tab4.title: Can I integrate with my existing e-commerce platform?
tab4.content:
Yes. We have a number of eCommerce integrations available - these are Magento, Opencart, Prestashop, Shopware, WooCommerce and XT:Commerce.
We also offer a payment widget, making integration easy even without an eCommerce website.
We plan to add integrations in the future, both for eCommerce platforms, as well as those for accounting, subscription billing, and other similar solutions.

tab5.title: Can I display my own branding throughout the payment process?
tab5.content: Yes. Our payments widget, eCommerce integrations and direct integration options can be fully customised to reflect the look and feel of your brand.

tab6.title: Are there additional fees that I should be aware of?
tab6.content: In cases of customer disputes, you may incur additional fees for chargebacks. These are charged at a rate of X for each occurrence.

tab7.title: Will I be charged for failed transactions?
tab7.content: No. We will only ever charge you for successful transactions.

tab8.title: What if I have to refund a customer?
tab8.content: For full refunds, all processing fees - with the exception of the per transaction fee – are returned. For partial refunds, these fees are returned on a prorated amount basis. We do not charge any additional fees for processing a refund.

tab9.title: Do you offer volume-based pricing?
tab9.content: Yes, we can offer volume-based pricing to larger merchants processing in excess of X per month. To find out more, please contact our sales team.

sec1.subHeading: Ceevo is a global payment services provider that empowers businesses to accept almost any type of payment from anywhere in the world.
